sqlMap.select: SELECT B.DETAIL_RESVE_CODE, B.RESVE_CODE, B.ROOM_KND AS ROOM_KND_CODE, PK_CMMN.TO_CODE_VALUE('CMMN_CODE', B.ROOM_KND) AS ROOM_KND_VALUE, B.SEAT_NO, B.ROOM FROM RESVE A, DETAIL_RESVE B WHERE A.RESVE_CODE = B.RESVE_CODE AND B.RESVE_CODE = #RESVE_CODE#
sqlMap.procedure:
{ CALL PK_MEMBER_RESVE.SP_IST_DEATIL_RESVE( #roomKndCode,mode=IN#, #seatNo,mode=IN#, #psngrKndCode,mode=IN#, #dspsnGradCode,mode=IN#, #room,mode=IN#, #frAmount,mode=IN#, #code,mode=OUT,jdbcType=VARCHAR#, #rtCode,mode=OUT,jdbcType=VARCHAR#, #rtMsg,mode=OUT,jdbcType=VARCHAR# ) }
/******************************************************************* * 이름 : SP_IST_DEATIL_RESVE * 설명 : 상세예약 등록 * 파라미터 : 객실유형, 좌석번호, 승객유형, 장애인등급, 호실, 운임금액 리턴할 예약 코드, 에러 코드(0 : 성공, 1 : 에러), 에러 메세지 ******************************************************************/
sqlMap.select: SELECT B.DETAIL_RESVE_CODE /*상세예약코드*/, PK_CMMN.TO_CODE_VALUE('CMMN_CODE', B.ROOM_KND) AS ROOM_KND /*호실유형*/, B.SEAT_NO /*좌석번호*/, B.ROOM /*호실*/, CASE B.PSNGR_KND WHEN 'PSNGR_3' THEN PK_CMMN.TO_CODE_VALUE('CMMN_CODE', B.DSPSN_GRAD) ELSE PK_CMMN.TO_CODE_VALUE('CMMN_CODE', B.PSNGR_KND) END AS PSNGR_KND /*승객유형 : 장애인(급수), 일반, 경로, 어린이*/, TO_CHAR(B.FR_AMOUNT, 'FM9,999,999,999') AS FR_AMOUNT /*운임금액*/, NVL(TO_CHAR(B.DSCNT_AMOUNT, 'FM9,999,999,999'), 0) AS DSCNT_AMOUNT /*할인금액*/, TO_CHAR(B.RCPT_AMOUNT, 'FM9,999,999,999') AS RCPT_AMOUNT /*영수금액*/, B.PSNGR_NM /*승차자명*/ FROM RESVE A, DETAIL_RESVE B WHERE A.RESVE_CODE = B.RESVE_CODE AND A.RESVE_CODE = #RESVE_CODE# ORDER BY B.SEAT_NO
